rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with a traditional Kerala-style entrance featuring ornamental wood carvings and intricate stone work. Vastu principles are observed by aligning the main door in the south-east direction to invite positive energy.

rooms.name: living_room
rooms.description: Spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the south wall for abundant natural light and a panoramic view. Traditional Kerala-style wooden ceilings and intricate jali work enhance the aesthetic appeal.

rooms.name: dining_area
rooms.description: A formal dining space integrated into the living area; decorated with local stone accents and traditional motifs in line with Kerala aesthetics.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet traditional kitchen design incorporating sustainable materials and energy-efficient appliances. Designed following Vastu principles for optimal layout and natural light.

rooms.name: utility_room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen with storage space; includes provisions for water connection, cleaning supplies and appliances as per local building norms.

rooms.name: guest_bathroom
rooms.description: Guest bathroom located near the entrance, following Vastu principles for privacy and energy flow.

openings.description: Main door aligned with Vastu principles to invite positive energy. Incorporates intricate carvings reflective of Kerala tradition.
Large window installation ensuring abundant natural light and scenic views, designed in a traditional yet modern style.
Access to the two-car garage located in the north-west quadrant of the ground floor. Complies with local building norms for safety and accessibility.

rooms.name: master_bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite featuring Kerala-style flooring and ceiling detailing, en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and a private balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows ensuring privacy and natural light.

rooms.name: bedroom_2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom incorporating traditional Kerala aesthetics with built-in storage and ample lighting. Adjacent to the master suite for family convenience.

rooms.name: bedroom_3
rooms.description: Third bedroom designed similarly to the second bedroom, ensuring symmetry and balance as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: home_office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office space with ergonomic design. Features ample natural light through strategically placed windows and traditional Kerala-style decor for a blend of comfort and productivity.

rooms.name: bathroom
rooms.description: Main bathroom serving the bedrooms and home office, incorporating modern fixtures with traditional Kerala accents.

openings.description: Provides privacy and abundant natural light to the master bedroom in line with both luxury design and Vastu principles.
Connects the master bedroom to an open balcony, designed for relaxation and fresh air intake following local aesthetics.
